dc:title: Where is Sanctuary?
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: She is appalled that some don't believe the killing of Jews in Nazi-occupied Europe. Cites documented incidents of mass killings. Lists twelve recommendations for rescue, among them a change in immigration laws in the United States. Keywords: anti-semitism
